original_text: Then the voice said to me, ‘You must continue to tell God's message to people. You must say what will happen to people from everywhere in the world. They are the people of many nations, and people who speak many languages, and also their kings.’
korean_text: 그가 내게 말하기를 네가 많은 백성과 나라와 방언과 임금에게 다시 예언하여야 하리라 하더라

sentences.original_text: Then the voice said to me
'You must continue to tell God's message to people
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 계속해서 하나님의 메시지를 사람들에게 전해야 하며

sentences.original_text: You must say what will happen to people
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 사람들에게 무슨 일이 일어날지 말해야 하느니라

sentences.original_text: They are the people of many nations
and people who speak many languages
